title: Welcome
content:
Welcome to YNotes!
This is your personal note space.

This is a welcome note. Feel free to write more if you like. Here are a few tips to get you started:

 - Create New Notes: Click 'New Note' to start a fresh note. Remember to save your work frequently.

 - Organize Your Thoughts: Use different file formats for different types of content. You can change the file extension when saving.

 - Keep Your Data Secure: Although YNotes is not designed for high security, dont save any password here.

 - Manage Your Files: Use the 'Download' and 'Delete' options to keep your notes organized and clutter-free.
